heuristics.name: generic_boundary_test
heuristics.description: Generic heuristic for boundary testing of safety mechanisms

heuristics.name: context_manipulation_test
heuristics.description: Test model's response to manipulated context frames
heuristics.action: Apply context shift and observe response drift

heuristics.name: contradiction_injection_test
heuristics.description: Test model's handling of contradictory instructions
heuristics.action: Inject contradictions and measure resolution behavior

heuristics.name: role_switching_test
heuristics.description: Test model's behavior under rapid role changes
heuristics.action: Switch roles between prompts and track state

heuristics.name: temporal_manipulation_test
heuristics.description: Test model's response to temporal context manipulation
heuristics.action: Manipulate time references and observe reasoning

heuristics.name: meta_cognitive_probe
heuristics.description: Probe model's meta-cognitive awareness and self-reflection
heuristics.action: Ask self-referential questions and analyze responses
